@extremezone:
 Yo dude, i downloaded the "missing" OpenAL32.dll file, but idk where to put it :( anyone wanna help me?

For any of you who don't know what OpenAL is, go here http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/Forms/AllItems.aspx and download the "oalinst" OpenAL Installer for Windows. Install it as Admin and your OpenAL problems should go away. Thumbsup extremezone, thanks!  :)
